official_title: To establish a Manufacturing Alliance Program within the Technology Administration of the Department of Commerce to assist small manufacturers in research and development, technology transfer, and worker training.

summary.text: Strategic Manufacturing Alliance Act of 1992 - Establishes in the Technology Administration of the Department of Commerce a Manufacturing Alliance Program to facilitate industry-specific consortia of academia and industry for the conduct of basic research and development, technology transfer, and worker training initiatives. Mandates grants to the consortia.

titles.title: To establish a Manufacturing Alliance Program within the Technology Administration of the Department of Commerce to assist small manufacturers in research and development, technology transfer, and worker training.
